name: Variant Human
description: Some humans are born with a spark of specialization that sets them apart. They trade the broad adaptability of their kin for a focused talent developed early in life. This path allows for greater customization, representing an individual who has trained in a specific skill and learned a unique technique or area of expertise (a feat) from the very start of their adventuring career.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

choiceOptions.label: Choose two ability scores to increase by 1

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Skills
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Feat
traits.description: You gain one feat of your choice.
